name: An Old Nightmare
description:
This is a very basic project that only exists to teach myself Unity and Blender, made in my free time over about three months, hosted here so I can share a URL with friends. This is based on a real reoccurring nightmare I had as a kid about a vampire asking to be let in. I figured this was way more interesting than the usual Unity tutorials where you make snake.

All models and textures are by me, as is the pretty messy scripting. The sounds are all from ZapSplat.com. The game starts paused because I haven't learned scene management yet lol.

Controls: 

Movement: WASD or Left stick

Look: Mouse or Right stick

Zoom: Hold Right mouse button or Right trigger

Inspect/Use: Left mouse button or West Button

Toggle Flashlight: Keyboard E or North button

Pause Menu: Keyboard Tab or Gamepad Start 

The game doesn't end if you win, you just close it.
